content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today?
Hi! I need some help with electrical outlets in my kitchen.
I'd be happy to help you with that! Could I have your name, please?
Thank you, Linda! Could you please provide the full address where you need the electrical service?
Oh, it's um... I think it's 1245 Main... wait, is it Main Street or Main Avenue? I always get it mixed up, sorry. Let me go check.
No worries, take your time! Just let me know once you have your correct full address. This helps us confirm service availability and get a technician out to you.
Well, I can't find any of my mail right now. I think the number is right, but my neighbor says it's Main Place, but online it says Main St. What do you need exactly?

I just need your full street address, including house number, street name, and city. That way we can make sure we reach you without any mix-ups. Whenever you're able to locate it, please text it to me!
I’ll have to check with my daughter when she gets home. I don’t want to give you the wrong address. Can I message you later with it?
No problem at all! Just send your full address when it’s convenient for you. As soon as I have that, we can move forward with booking your appointment. I’ll look out for your message!
Alright, thanks for your help. I’ll get back to you.
reason: Customer was unable to provide a usable address.
